basics.name: Pattawee Puangchit
basics.label: PhD Candidate | Trade Researcher
basics.summary: Award-winning Ph.D. Candidate in Agricultural Economics with extensive experience in data analytics, international trade policies, and CGE modeling. Recipient of the prestigious Anandamahidol Foundation Scholarship. Lead analyst for World Bank-funded research on U.S. Trade Policies. Expert in analyzing economic implications of trade policies using advanced analytical tools and methods with proficiency in multiple programming languages and economic databases.

work.name: Center for Global Trade Analysis (GTAP), Purdue University
work.summary: Conducting research on international trade policies using CGE models, specializing in GTAP-Standard and GTAP-HET models to analyze economic implications of trade policies.
highlights: Led analysis for World Bank-funded research on U.S. Trade Policies (Tariff War) using CGE Model ($30,000 funding)
Contributing to GTAP 11 Data Base development
Developing dynamic approaches to model Non-Tariff Measures in ASEAN region

work.name: AMATA Production Co., Ltd.
work.summary: Leading data analytics operations for company strategy and decision making.

work.name: University of California, Davis
work.summary: Served as teaching assistant for Welfare Analysis of Agricultural Policies course with Professor Julian Alston.
highlights: Facilitated student learning in economic welfare analysis

work.name: Unilever Thailand
work.summary: Participated in Future Leaders' Program, working with the Food Retail Team (Knorr) to analyze market data and consumer trends.
highlights: Applied data-driven insights to market strategy
Analyzed consumer behavior and retail trends

work.name: True Corporation Public Company Limited
work.summary: Analyzed business data to support strategic decision-making and identify growth opportunities.

work.name: Agricultural and Agro-Industrial Product Improvement Institute, Kasetsart University
work.summary: Developed business strategies for agricultural and agro-industrial products improvement.

work.name: Agricultural and Agro-Industrial Product Improvement Institute, Kasetsart University
work.summary: Assisted with research projects on agricultural product improvement and market analysis.

volunteer.organization: Department of Economics and Business School, Kasetsart University
volunteer.summary: Leading alumni engagement and networking initiatives for young graduates.
highlights: Organizing mentorship programs connecting alumni with current students
Facilitating career development events and professional networking opportunities

volunteer.summary: Served as guest speaker for various university events and conferences.
highlights: Presented on "The Pathway to Success" published by Career Facts Website (Aug 2020)
Speaker on "Future of Thai Educational System and Online Class" at Kasetsart University Executive Conference (June 2020)
Presented on "Inspiring High-School Students to Excel" at Kasetsart University Laboratory School Annual Meeting (2017, 2018, 2019)

volunteer.summary: Led student association activities and represented student interests to university administration.
highlights: Organized academic and professional development events
Facilitated student engagement in departmental initiatives
Represented student concerns to faculty and administration

courses: Dissertation: Incorporating Non-tariff Measures to Dynamic CGE Model
Thesis: The Impact of the ASEAN Economic Community on Agricultural Trade

awards.title: Anandamahidol Foundation Scholarship

projects.name: HARplus - R Package for Agricultural Data Analysis
projects.summary: Developed an open-source R package for harmonized agricultural data processing and analysis designed to streamline data cleaning and transformation for agricultural economists.

projects.name: Economic Implications of the U.S. Trade Policies (Tariff War) using CGE Model
projects.summary: Lead Analyst for World Bank-funded research conducted by GTAP. Project funding: $30,000.

projects.name: Impacts of Non-tariff Measures on ASEAN Trade: A Dynamic Approach
projects.summary: Developing methodologies to quantify and analyze the effects of non-tariff measures on trade flows between ASEAN countries using dynamic CGE modeling.

projects.name: GTAP 11 Data Base Development
projects.summary: Contributing to the development of Global Trade, Assistance, and Production Database, specifically on disaggregating labor payments.

projects.name: The Impact of the ASEAN Economic Community on Agricultural Trade
projects.summary: Master's thesis research using Synthetic Control Method to analyze how the formation of the ASEAN Economic Community affected agricultural trade patterns and economic outcomes.

projects.name: Consumer Behavioral Analysis for Thai Local Ice-cream
projects.summary: Award-winning research project on consumer behavior analysis, presented at the 22nd Annual Conference on Economic Analysis, Kasetsart University.

projects.name: Business Model for Ecotourism: Travel and Study of Thai Farm Culture
projects.summary: Developed comprehensive business plan for sustainable ecotourism focused on Thai agricultural heritage, awarded first runner-up in National Business Plan Competition.

projects.name: Cost Analysis of Digital Platforms for Thai Agricultural Commodities
projects.summary: Winning project in National Strategic and Business Analysis Competition focusing on digital transformation of agricultural markets in Thailand.

projects.name: Impacts of Technological Development on Agricultural Market
projects.summary: Award-winning analysis of how technological innovations are reshaping agricultural markets and supply chains in Thailand.

projects.name: Economic Impacts and Business Analysis for Thai Royal Projects
projects.summary: Case study of Doi-Angkhangs, presented at the 50th TMA Thailand Competitiveness Conference.
